TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Nuwatan_o_Kumud, title = Nuwatan_o_Kumud, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nuwatan_o_Kumud} }

S.FORM: nipa saselal yu adiding hay ku nikaudip numaku, mi laday tu wama numaku tayda ini pasaselal nu nyadu' tu kapah, kapah adihan kuni pa saselal nu nyadu', silacen nu kakaselal ku tatama inu ayawan nu dabek milayap tuni paini nuwama nu nyadu' (tumuk) tu sapa pugec i tangah tu sasubin, atu sapa cuungan tubanuh nu ayam, u tungus tunika tanengay tu mi saselal ku sausi, tanengaytu pa dihing tu nyadu' anu mahida . maadiadih i sasa nu cilal, u duma kunika seneng nu balucu' manamuh a mitapal, u waku tumaku maydih tu a balaki, ngay milabu tu nipa saselal nu nyadu'.

nipa saselal yo adiding hay ko nikaodip nomako, mi laday to wama nomako tayda ini pasaselal no nyado' to kapah, kapah adihan koni pa saselal no nyado', silacen no kakaselal ko tatama ino ayawan no dabek milayap toni paini nowama no nyado' (tomok) to sapa pogec i tangah to sasobin, ato sapa coongan tobanoh no ayam, o tongos tonika tanengay to mi saselal ko saosi, tanengayto pa dihing to nyado' ano mahida . maadiadih i sasa no cilal, o doma konika seneng no baloco' manamoh a mitapal, o wako tomako maydih to a balaki, ngay milabo to nipa saselal no nyado'.
